name: Wormatozoa (distributive)
description:
Wormatozoa is a gross 2D point-and-click precision platformer about parasitic worms! Control worms with your mouse through dangerous environments as they evolve from tiny parasites to city-engulfing monsters.

Play the demo now!

Follow updates on Twitter!

Inspired by Snake (the classical arcade game) and Super Meat Boy, expect to die a lot on the journey.

Note about Linux - The game is unavailable for Linux natively, but Linux users should be able to run the Windows version through emulators like Wine.

Listen to the soundtrack on YouTube!
